name: Hereafter Runner
description:
Developed in 48 hours for Boğaziçi Game Jam.


Theme You can't win unless go to hell. Gameplay

Finish the map as soon as possible using the place switching mechanic.

WASD /Mouse - Movement

Space - Jump

LShift - Dash

Left Click - Interaction

R - Switch Place

ESC - Pause

Assets

ColorSkies

TGU Skybox Pack

Sounds and Musics

Musics by Tri-Tachyon

qubodup

felixyadomi
